name: Sherlock Tumblr Dashboard Icons
description: Changes your Tumblr dashboard icons into Cute versions of Sherlock Holmes,John Watson, Mary Morstan, Molly Hooper, Mycroft Holmes, Mrs. Hudson, And D.I Lestrade. Icons use a limited pastel palette for continuity.
additional_info: This version is still under beta; this version still has some sizing issues. Some of the images don't line exactly up with the icon boxes. The images, however are fairly satisfying overall still.
